fullText: Welcome to my channel. 350 grams of red lentils Soak in water Lentil bread is not only healthy but also surprisingly easy to prepare. No kneading, no yeast, no long waiting times. Subscribe and click the bell to stay updated on new recipes. Let it sit overnight Rinse under running water 5 tablespoons of olive oil Salt to taste Blend until smooth with an immersion blender This bread is rich in protein, iron, and fiber. Supports digestion, boosts the immune system, and provides longer satiety. 1 teaspoon of baking powder 1 tablespoon of apple cider vinegar Mix well And the most important thing: this bread is quick and easy to prepare and consists of readily available ingredients. 3 tablespoons of psyllium husk Mix Let me know from which city you are watching my video. Feedback is very important to me. Thank you. 3-4 tablespoons of sunflower seeds Lightly toast Stir constantly I would appreciate it if you could share your opinion after watching. This is very important to me. Thank you. Mix. Let it sit for 15 minutes Line a baking dish with parchment paper. Grease it with oil. Rate the video from 1 to 10. This is very important to me. Pour into a baking dish. You can add your favorite spices to the dough. I would be happy if you could share your opinion after watching. I really appreciate your feedback. Thank you. Smooth it out. Grease with water. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake in a preheated oven at 180 °C (350 °F) for 60–70 minutes. The bread is ready. Let it cool completely. How does it taste? Will you bake it? I look forward to your feedback. See you in new recipes.
